2.title: Chapter 2: The Numbers
2.plot:

3.title: Chapter 3: Eight Years Ago
3.plot:

4.title: Chapter 4: The Others

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: After the nationwide eclipse, the Chaddie family start experiencing weird powers around them.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: While Jake is trapped 50 years in the future, Mike and Phoebe unite with other 'Supers" to find out more about their powers.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: Jake returns to the present to see Mike and Phoebe relaxing on a field and having fun, thinking he has been abandoned, he's left in a horrible situation.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Upon Jake's travels to find the family he knew, he meets Mr Stevenson, a man who has had powers for years.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: With Jake continuing on his journey elsewhere, a man is discovering his new abilities as well as a new threat.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Travelling to Cyprus to escape, Jake meets his sister who is on holiday there. Threy reunite and explore each other's powers, along with the revelation that Jake has more abilities that teleportation.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: Upon realizing that Jake has the power to absorb other people's powers, his body goes into overload and Phoebe must choose whether to sacrifice herself or not.

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: Eight months after Jake exploded, he wakes up with memories he feels are not his own.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: With Jake remembering his past, he meets Mr Stevenson once more who tells him that a plague has infected the world.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: Jake meets the Boss of the Company, who tries to kill him.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Jake looks through the files on himself, family and friends that the Company had.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: The Boss meets Jake once more.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Upon retrieving the cure to the plague, Jake travels across the world healing all the 'Supers'.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: Jake goes into hiding to avoid the Boss of the Company.

8.title: Chapter 8
8.plot: Confronting the Boss once more, Jake is faced with a life changing decision.

9.title: Chapter 9
9.plot: Jake retaliates against his enemy with some horrible consequences.

10.title: Chapter 10
10.plot: With the Boss dead, Jake returns to his normal life. But is this the case at all?

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: With life returning to normal somewhat, Mike and Phoebe Chaddie try to move on from their family member's disappearance and reconnect with the other 'Supers' in their lives.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: Alive with no explanation, Jake meets his savior, Jamie Wicks who shows him what happened.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: Jake travels to the year 2010 to find out what he must do to fix the past, only to find a future with destruction and death.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Jake and his future self return to the present to deal with the Boss of the Company once and for all.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: Jake revisits Jamie to ask more about his past.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Jamie continues to open up about his past, revealing the history of how he got his powers.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: After finding about Jamie's past, Jake goes on the search for a man named "Mortis", who was a significant impact on the 'Supers' community.

8.title: Chapter 8
8.plot: Jake locates Mortis, who can control Dark Matter. Mortis attacks Jake leaving his half dead, will Mortis be kind and will Jake survive?

9.title: Chapter 9
9.plot: Mortis remembers his past and how he got his powers.

10.title: Chapter 10
10.plot: Jake recuperates in hiding, remembering his old family and struggling with his inner demons.

11.title: Chapter 11
11.plot: In an act of desperation, Jake goes back in time to first time he received his powers, in the hopes of stopping himself from gaining his powers altogether.

12.title: Chapter 12
12.plot: After realizing what he has done, Jake returns to his past self, removing the memories of his past self ever meeting him. Will he still gain his powers?

13.title: Chapter 13
13.plot: Returning to the present to find everything intact, Jake is taken to see an old friend, Mr Stevenson, who is now running an organization that helps people with abilities.

14.title: Chapter 14
14.plot: Mr Stevenson asks Jake to take him to Switzerland to die, only to be betrayed.

15.title: Chapter 15
15.plot: Another nationwide eclipse passes by and everyone looses their powers except Jake, who only gains in strength. Jake must visit his sister, Phoebe, to discover what's happened.

16.title: Chapter 16
16.plot: Jake and Phoebe return to their old home to find a clone of Phoebe there, with the intention to kill.

17.title: Chapter 17
17.plot: Jamie Wicks meets David McDonald, a man who can chat sound waves through shouting, with the intention of hiding from Jake, now that they are powerless.

18.title: Chapter 18
18.plot: Jake revisits his long lost mother for Christmas.

19.title: Chapter 19
19.plot: Jake clashes with Jamie and David, as well as Mortis where a fight ensues.

20.title: Chapter 20
20.plot: Recovering from his fight, Jake recovers memories from before he got his powers where Mr Stevenson intervened.

21.title: Chapter 21
21.plot: With a new found rage, Jake returns to kill Mortis and Jamie Wicks, only to find Jamie has a twin brother, Jeremy, who is Mortis' apprentice.

22.title: Chapter 22
22.plot: With Jake's rage feeding through his powers, Jamie attempts to calm Jake down by teaching ways in which he could control his rage.

23.title: Chapter 23
23.plot: With Jake's rage under control, he goes soul searching in the hopes of ending this charade once and for all.

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: With Jake's new plan to capture all of the 'Supers' for their own good begins with taking down his own sister as well as his nemesis, but not all goes to plan.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: With Jamie and Phoebe trapped, they escape using a machine that grants them their powers back.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: Capturing Mortis and Jeremy, Jake goes on the hunt for more 'Supers'.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: When Jake goes to find more 'Supers', he discovered his lost twin brother who has the ability to phase in and out of different locations.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: The organization Jake is heading catches up with an advanced 'Supers' known as a God, who tries to fend himself off from these people.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Jake spends some time away to reflect on what he's done to old friends and family.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: Seeking redemption, Jake visits Jamie Wicks to console with him.

8.title: Chapter 8
8.plot: Jake realizes that there is no going back from the crimes he has committed and decides there is only one way to end all of this.

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: With Alex effectively taking Jake's place in life, he struggles to engage in a new life.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: Alex tries to concentrate on his powers, which has been keeping hidden for too long now, only to discover some truths about Jake.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: With Luke gaining a time stopping ability, he discovers that within the Planner, is another person, known as Professor Macdal.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Alex goes back to Jamie for more advice concerning his powers as well as the prophecy given to him from Future David.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: Jamie admits to Jake that there was man in contact with him recently known as the Planner, who tried to kidnap him but failed. Alex sees this new threat and works with Jamie to stop this.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Alex meditates, trying to concentrate on the identity of the Planner.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: Alex decides to travel into the underworld to save Jake's soul.

8.title: Chapter 8
8.plot: With Alex's powers stolen and now lost 27 years in the past, Jake comes back to find him only to find himself faced with Jamie Wicks, a man who now hates him and The Planner, the man behind every since 'Super' that's existed since the beginning.

9.title: Chapter 9
9.plot: The year is 1999. Jamie Wicks is a young boy who has not yet developed his powers and living with him is his father, Marcus Chaddie (otherwise known as the Planner), who is working on manifesting powerful abilities in his son.

10.title: Chaper 10
10.plot: Still 27 years in the past, Jamie locks down the building in order to kill Jake once and for all. With the Planner objecting before being knocked unconscious, Jamie goes ahead nonetheless in his revenge against Jake.

11.title: Chapter 11
11.plot: Arriving in the Present Day, the effects of Alex's disappearance finally hit Jake. Alex was forever trapped in 1981 with no help and continues to be lost.

12.title: Chapter 12
12.plot: Jake goes on a trek to find the location of Alex in the Present Day, now knowing that 1981 is too dangerous for him with the Planner at large there.

13.title: Chapter 13
13.plot: With Mortis now returning to Jake's life as a God with revamped powers, Mortis talks of a power source known as the Catalyst, which will grant him ultimate power.

14.title: Chapter 14
14.plot: With Mortis close to the Catalyst, Jake becomes even more suspicious of his nature.

15.title: Chapter 15
15.plot: Upon stealing the Catalyst and using it to his own devices, he roams the Earth looking for a purpose now that he is finally immortal.

16.title: Chapter 16
16.plot: Five years in the future, Jake, Jamie and the Planner are friends. However, when Mortis in his infinite immortality threatens the Earth, the trio must come together, but one must fall.

17.title: Chapter 17
17.plot: With Jake now dead, the Planner and Jamie are the only two left and are visited by the Devil, in the form of Jake Chaddie, to haunt them.

18.title: Chapter 18
18.plot: With the Planner now also dead, Jamie is haunted by the apparitions before realizing what this all means and what could be done.

19.title: Chaper 19
19.plot: In the Present Day, Jake and Jamie are warned by Future Jamie of the events to come at the hands of Mortis and the Planner and that they must act quickly. Jake and Jamie split to go and get help, which involves Jake reuniting with his father after two years.

20.title: Chapter 20
20.plot: After being kidnapped and taken back to Mr Stevenson's house, Jake murders his mother, sister and almost kills Mr Stevenson in a venomous rage, he doesn't have long to save the world from the Planner and Mortis, could he do it?

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: Every surviving 'Super' joins together to discuss how to stop Jake once and for all, Mike Chaddie, Jake's father is distraught over his entire family dying and wants to see his son put to justice.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: With Jake out of control and without boundaries, the Planner and Mike Chaddie attempt to reason with Jake.

3.title: Chapter 3
3.plot: The five 'Supers' meet to discuss Jake. With Jake escaping and getting to America, Mike wants to know if Jake really needs to die.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Mike goes to see his son to reason with him, which ends horribly when the Planner shows up to take Jake down.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: After Mike's death which caused Jake to go nuclear and destroy half the world, Jake meets on neutral ground with the Planner, Mr. Stevenson and Mortis to formulate a plan to save the world.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: Jake meets with David McDonald and the 'Super' to discuss his plan to restart the entire time line, which results in some backlash from them.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot: The last surviving 'Supers' meet up for one last time. Jake tells them what they all need to do to successfully reboot the time line. Mr Stevenson has other ideas and tries to steal Mortis' powers.

8.title: Chapter 8
8.plot: With Mr Stevenson dead, Jake, the Planner and Mortis make one final farewell as they all disperse to the appropriate times to avoid their births.

9.title: Chapter 9
9.plot: Jake, Mortis and the Planner arrive in their respective time periods. The Planner, in 1909, kills his mother before he is born. Mortis, in 1995, does the same thing. Jake has other plans.

10.title: Chapter 10
10.plot: Jake arrives before he first teleported. When he won the Oscar for 'Best International Movie Maker'. He remembers who he once was. An aspiring filmmaker. He'd forgotten that life and had become a monster through these powers he was given. He takes Younger Jake aside and talks to him, he tells his younger self what has happened and asks if this is the right thing to do. Younger Jake is obviously denying this so Jake takes him to the future, where everything is covered in radiation and death. Younger Jake soon agrees to die to save the world, to which it turns out that ...

1.title: Chapter 1
1.plot: Resetting the time line was no use. The Planner, now 23 year old businessman as opposed to the 103 year old immortal, is running the Company with his partner, the Haitian, who can control and wipe people's memories. They become aware of some temporal changes near Luke Redford and go and investigate. Whilst the Agent tracks down Mr Stevenson for the murder of 30 people.

2.title: Chapter 2
2.plot: After being ambushed, Luke tries to escape from the Haitian whilst trying to work out what the hell is going on.

4.title: Chapter 4
4.plot: Trapped within his own body, Professor Macdal fights the Planner for control.

5.title: Chapter 5
5.plot: After being possessed by the Planner, Luke returns home to try and heal himself but in turn results in a horrible death.

6.title: Chapter 6
6.plot: With Phoebe dead, Luke suddenly has a vision of a different time line, seeing Jake Chaddie destroying his time line to save their world. Luke realizes what he must do and makes the ultimate sacrifice. Meanwhile the Agent threatens Mr Stevenson with dire consequences for Mr Stevenson.

7.title: Chapter 7
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Supers
plot: After gaining supernatural abilities, a group of seemingly unrelated individuals uncover the conspiracies and mysteries surrounding these powers.::Connor Chadwick
